summary: This appears to be a research notice or transaction record related to a summons or subpoena request, possibly for financial records in the Epstein case. It references a deposit electronic transaction and includes request codes and account information, suggesting it is part of a legal or investigative process.

events.title: Research Notice/Transaction Record Created
events.description: A research notice or electronic transaction record was created in relation to a summons or subpoena request, as indicated by the document's metadata and codes.

locations.name: Charlotte, NC 28201
locations.context: Mentioned as the location of the 'Summons and Subpoenas Department' associated with this research notice or transaction.

keyFacts: The document is a research notice or record for a deposit electronic transaction, with a paper copy noted as not available.
It is associated with a summons or subpoenas request, indicated by the 'Summons and Subpoenas Department' reference and request codes.
The document was created or processed on September 2, 2019, based on the date in the metadata.
It includes specific request and account codes (e.g., REQUEST 00007740637000000, ACCT REQUESTOR U588969, Research Code 22361953, 22362046).
The transaction or request is linked to a location in Charlotte, North Carolina (Department D1111-016).
